content: **crocheted top in drops belle the piece is worked with wrap-around style double crochets and fans the piece is worked top down sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no vs-049 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl finished measurements chest measurements 80-88-96-106-118-130 cm = 31 1/2 -34 5/8 -37 3/4 -41 3/4 -46 1/2 -51 1/4 full length 32-34-36-38-40-42 cm = 12 1/2 -13 3/8 -14 1/4 -15 -15 3/4 -16 1/2 all measurements in charts are in cm **materials** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-300-300-350-400-400 g color 03 light beige **crochet gauge** 18 double crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm = us 6 hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size
